name: Green Haven Nursery
shortDescription: A modern, full-featured online nursery e-commerce platform
description:
üåø GreenHaven E-commerce Platform

GreenHaven is a modern e-commerce platform designed for plant enthusiasts and nurseries, providing a seamless shopping experience for customers and powerful management tools for administrators.

üöÄ Features Overview

üõçÔ∏è Customer Features

Product Browsing: Explore a wide variety of plants with advanced filtering and search capabilities for easy discovery.

Shopping Cart: Add or remove items with real-time inventory checks to ensure availability.

Secure Checkout: Enjoy flexible payment options, including Cash on Delivery and Stripe integration for secure transactions.

Order Tracking: Monitor order status in real time, from placement to delivery.

Responsive Design: Optimized interface ensures a smooth experience on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

Product Details: Comprehensive product pages feature high-quality images and detailed care instructions to help customers make informed decisions.

üë®‚Äçüíº Admin Features

Product Management: Perform full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on products directly from the admin panel.

Category Management: Organize products into customizable categories for better browsing and inventory organization.

Order Management: Track and update order statuses, providing customers with timely updates.

Image Upload: Bulk upload product images with drag-and-drop support, simplifying catalog management.

Inventory Tracking: Monitor stock levels in real time to prevent overselling and ensure accurate availability.

Analytics Dashboard: Gain insights into sales performance and inventory trends with an intuitive analytics dashboard.

‚ú® Why GreenHaven?
GreenHaven streamlines the online plant shopping experience while empowering nursery owners with robust tools for managing products, orders, and inventory. Built with modern technologies, it combines exceptional user experience with reliable backend operations to support growing businesses.

Would you like a shorter summary for use in social media or a resume bullet point?

name: Sports Facility Booking Platform
shortDescription: A modern booking platform focused on sports and insights
description:
This platform is a comprehensive facility booking and management system with secure JWT-based authentication and role-based access control.
Users can browse facilities, check real-time availability, and manage bookings through an intuitive dashboard.
Admins have full control over facilities, bookings, and platform settings, with advanced analytics for insights.
Integrated SSLCommerz ensures secure payment processing, complete with payment history and refund management.
The system includes interactive booking, cancellation policies, image uploads, and detailed facility information for a seamless experience.

name: Protocol
shortDescription: A documenation and project sturcture site
description: This is a documentation and project structure site designed to provide a comprehensive overview of the Protocol project. It includes detailed information about the project's architecture, features, and usage guidelines. The site is built using modern web technologies to ensure a responsive and user-friendly experience.

name: Task Management App
shortDescription: Collaborative task management application with real-time updates
description: A modern task management application that enables teams to collaborate effectively. Features include project creation, task assignment, progress tracking, real-time notifications, and team communication. The app supports multiple project views including Kanban boards, list view, and calendar integration.
